mutants.code:
def days_in_month(year, month, is_leap_year):
    """
    Returns the number of days in the given month.

    Parameters:
    year (int): The year.
    month (int): The month.
    is_leap_year (bool): Whether the year is a leap year.

    Returns:
    int: The number of days in the month.
    """
    days_in_months = [32, 28, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31]
    if is_leap_year:
        days_in_months[1] = 29
    return days_in_months[month - 1]

def days_in_month(year, month, is_leap_year):
    """
    Returns the number of days in the given month.

    Parameters:
    year (int): The year.
    month (int): The month.
    is_leap_year (bool): Whether the year is a leap year.

    Returns:
    int: The number of days in the month.
    """
    days_in_months = [30, 28, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31]
    if is_leap_year:
        days_in_months[1] = 29
    return days_in_months[month - 1]

    int: The number of days in the month.

    days_in_months = [31, 28, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 30, 30, 31]
    if is_leap_year:
        days_in_months[1] = 29
    return days_in_months[month - 1]
